name: Caladrius Blaze
overview: Caladrius Blaze is a vertical-scrolling shoot 'em up developed by MOSS and includes all the elements of Caladrius and Caladrius AC, as well as adding extra content like new stages, story scenarios, bosses and characters designed by Yasuda. Features: • Multiple storylines made with more than 15 unique characters • 8 different characters and ships with unique powers to choose from • 'Shame Break' system that cuts away the character's outfit as they take damage • 'Element Shot' system that allows strategic weapon level up • 'Tutorial Mode' and 'Synchro Mode' enjoyable for even first timers
